englishTranslationText:
All praise is to Allah, the Lord	Of The	
Creation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sab	khoobiyāñ Allah ko, jo Malik sāre jahañ	
wāloñ ka.

englishTranslationText: The Most	Gracious,	the Most Merciful
Owner of the	Day	of Recompense

You alone we worship and from You	
alone we	seek help	 (and may we	
always).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hum Tujhi ko poojeiñ aur Tujhi se madad	
chāheiñ

englishTranslationText: Guide us on the Straight	Path.

arabicText: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 path	 of	 those	 whom	 You	 have	
favoured	-		Not	 the	path	of	 those	who	
earned	Your	anger - nor	of	 those	who	
are	astray.
%#$ "
romanUrduTranslationText:
Rāstā unka jin per Toone	 ehsān kiya.
Na unka jin per ghazab huwa aur na bahke	
huoñ ka
